EmailTemplate.name: CS Tech Request Survey to CSM
EmailTemplate.subject: CS Tech Request {!Survey_Result__c.Case__c}:{!Survey_Result__c.Case_Subject__c} was completed -Please leave feedback!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi there!
Could you please fill the survey! Click the following link to open edit page here {!Survey_Result__c.Instance_URL__c}{!Survey_Result__c.Id}/e?retURL=%2F{!Survey_Result__c.Id}
We really need this information. Thanks in advance!
Have a nice day!
